mapper.insert: insert into tbl_game_reviews(rno, content, userid, gno, regDate) values(seq_review.nextval, #{content}, #{userid}, #{gno}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_game_reviews set content= #{content}, regDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, gno ,content, userid, name, likes, regDate from ( select rownum rn, r.rno, r.gno , r.content, r.userid, r.regDate, m.name, l.likes from tbl_game_reviews r left outer join tbl_member m on r.userid = m.userid left outer join (select count(*) as likes, rno from tbl_like group by rno) l on l.rno = r.rno where gno = #{gno} and r.rno >0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} order by regDate desc
select count(rno) from tbl_game_reviews where gno = #{gno}
select rownum rn, rno, gno , content, r.userid, likes, regDate, m.name from tbl_game_reviews r left outer join tbl_member m on r.userid = m.userid where gno = #{gno}
